thread.title: Liverpool Lass

author: Liverpool Lass
title: Liverpool Lass
text:
Excellent service! Easy to navigate website, samples arrived next day and once I had placed my order I was kept up to date with tracking/delivery date etc:
Instructions are easy to follow. Wooden venetian blinds were no trouble to put up and look beautiful in my hallway!
Well done Blinds to go!! Oh! and I forgot to mention.... Â£110 cheaper than a Quote: I had from a local blind company!!
I would definitely recommend blinds 2 go.
